{{book |title=Walking with Bilbo:
A Devotional Adventure Through The Hobbit | image = Walking with Bilbo.jpg |author=Sarah Arthur |publisher=Tyndale House Publishers |date=February [[2005]] |format=Paperback |pages=224 |isbn=1414301316 |amazon=http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/1414301316/sr=8-1/qid=1145506555/ref=pd_bbs_1/102-6025778-4717761?%5Fencoding=UTF8 |amazonprice=$9.99 }} '''Walking with Bilbo''' is a devotional book by Sarah Arthur. ==From the publisher== {{blockquote|The author of Walking with Frodo takes readers on an adventure of faith with a new devotional that relates themes from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[The Hobbit]] to living the [[Christianity|Christian life]]. Unlike the fateful quest [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] was asked to carry out, [[Bilbo Baggins]]'s journey came as an unexpected adventure. Readers will be reminded that God chooses us to be unlikely heroes in the adventure of life.}} {{title|italics}} [[Category:Publications by title]] [[Category:Religious books]]
